title: I can't upgrade my skin shard
body: I got a skin shard from a loot box but when I tried to upgrade it the game won't let me and I have enough orange essence so I don't know what is going on. Does anyone know what is going on?

replies.body: Im having this issue as well it. I cant seem to buy the skin with orange essence and i have more than enough and i own the champ. What do I do?

I checked your account and it appears that you resolved the issue already.

If you experience this again or need help with anything else, let me know!

Only thing that really comes to mind at the moment is that you do not own the champion for that shard.
Let's say you got a skin shard for Vandal Gragas, BUT you do not own the champion Gragas. This would cause it to not allow you to upgrade the skin to perm even if you have enough Orange essence. You must first buy Gragas.

If you do own the champion for the skin you are trying to perm and have enough orange essence, then I'm not sure what the problem may be and will probably be best to wait for a reply from a rioter that hangs around support board. Best of luck to ya.
